title: CatNap

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may exhale the red smoke at night. (Once)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players know you are in-play.
- The Red Smoke will cause all players (besides evil players) to target themselves without a redirection notification.
- The Red Smoke frames every player as CatNap (5432)
- If a majority of players agree that today was a CatNap day, you die; if not, all evil players (and yourself) win.

desc:
Post 5432
*” THE PROTOTYPE, WILL SAVE US. “*
